description: An instance of an i18n locale.
title: I18nLocaleConfig

___files.description: The list of files containing the locale. Each member is an instance of a i18n locale file.
___files.title: Files

$eref.description: an instance of a i18n locale file.
$eref.title: I18nLocaleFileConfig

___key.description: It is the unique identifier for this file.
___key.title: Key

___url.description: The file can be local or on a distant server, but must be a valid JSON one.
___url.title: URL

___uid.description: The UID of the locale, we recommend a code respecting the RFC 5646 for better identification.
___uid.title: UID
